    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103141</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Composition de la lumière blanche</string>
            <string language="en">Composition of white light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbau des weißen Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Composição da luz branca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Composizione di luce bianca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθεση του άσπρου φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Composición de la luz blanca</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre une carte, divisée à parts égales en différentes couleurs, attachée à une ficelle mince. Cette installation est employée pour  démontrer que la lumière blanche est un mélange de couleurs.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a card equally divided to different colours tied to a thin string. This setup is used to demonstrate that white light is a mixture of colours.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">carte</string>
            <string language="en">card</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mélange</string>
            <string language="en">mixture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre</string>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ficelle</string>
            <string language="en">string</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière blanche</string>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Karte, die 
gleichmäßig den unterschiedlichen Farben geteilt wird, die an eine 
dünne Zeichenkette gebunden werden. Diese Installation wird 
verwendet, um zu zeigen, daß weißes Licht eine Mischung von Farben 
ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um cartão dividido 
ingualmente às cores diferentes amarradas a uma corda fina. 
Esta instalação é usada demonstrar que a luz branca é uma 
mistura das cores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una scheda divisa 
ugualmente ai colori differenti legati ad una stringa sottile. 
Questa messa a punto è usata per dimostrare che la luce bianca 
è una miscela dei colori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια κάρτα που διαιρείται 
εξίσου στα διαφορετικά χρώματα που δένονται σε μια λεπτή 
συμβολοσειρά. Αυτή η οργάνωση χρησιμοποιείται για να 
καταδείξει ότι το άσπρο φως είναι ένα μίγμα χρωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una tarjeta dividida 
igualmente a diversos colores atados a una cadena fina. Esta 
disposición se utiliza para demostrar que la luz blanca es una mezcla
de colores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichenkette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weißes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cartão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
